Howe I.S.D. has held our graduation rate between 97% - 100%, and in most cases the 2-3% stayed in school to graduate the following year.

News Release -
America‚Äôs high school students are graduating at a rate higher than ever before, and new data from the U.S. Department of Education shows the same is true for minority students. Nearly every racial and ethnic subgroup has seen a growth in graduation rates that outpaces that of white students ‚Äì a sign that the achievement gap is incrementally closing. Specifically, in two years the graduation rates for black and Hispanic students increased by 3.7 and 4.2 percentage points respectively, compared with 2.6 percentage points for white students.
